name: Untitled Multiplayer Battle
description:
Battle Terrible AI with Friends! (up to 2 players) Battle enemies and heal using Medkits! Playable with Keyboard and Controller! Controls: Keyboard:
  • WASD for Player 1
  • Arrow Keys for Player 2
Controller:
  • Left Joystick and DPad for Player 1
  • Right Joystick and ABXY for Player 2
